name: magic-guard

effect.scarlet_violet: Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected. Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.
effect.the_teal_mask: Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected. Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected. Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.

short_effect: Protects against damage not directly caused by a move.

flavor_text.the_teal_mask: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
